required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Impact Factors to Success Without Posterior Wall Puncture Using Dynamic Approach
clinical_study.official_title: Impact Factors to Success Without Posterior Wall Puncture Using Ultrasound-guided Short-axis Out-of-plane Dynamic Approach

brief_summary.textblock: The study is designed to evaluate and validate impact factors to success and complication using ultrasound guided short-axis out-of-plane dynamic approach, and validate the impaction.

detailed_description.textblock: The study including two phase: observational phase and validation phase. In observational phase, factors relative to success catheterization without posterior puncture and success in first attempt are evaluated. In validation phase, patients are randomized into different depth group with or without injection of saline. Success without posterior wall puncture, success in first attempt and overall, catheterization time are compared between groups.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion,an average of 5 minutes
primary_outcome.description: success to puncture and catheterize of radial artery, without posterior wall puncture.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion,an average of 5 minutes
primary_outcome.description: success puncture and catheterization in first attempt

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion,an average of 5 minutes
secondary_outcome.description: success catheterization with the maximum of 10 minutes

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Through study completion,an average of 5 minutes
secondary_outcome.description: time required for successful puncturing and catheterization with the maximum of 10 minutes

arm_group.description: Radial arterial deth is shallow than the cutoff point that relative to results.
Radial arterial deth is shallow than the cutoff point that relative to results, and increased by injection of saline to more than deep cutoff point.

intervention.description: deepen radial arterial depth by injection of saline to more than deep cutoff point relative to result.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- requirement of radial arterial catheterization during perioperative period
- within cardiac-vascular disease
- written consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- contraindication to radial arterial catheterization
- abnormal artery evaluated by ultrasonography
